backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, sermon storage with admin-controlled CRUD, and contact form submissions using access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping project features to relevant frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of all major frontend files for reference and documentation.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based OKLCH theme variables and base styles defining light/dark palettes and layout defaults.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript entry module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes for all site pages and wraps the app in a theme provider.
frontend/src/components/cta/PrimaryCTA.t: Reusable primary call‑to‑action button linking to a target route with consistent styling.
frontend/src/components/forms/ContactFor: Contact form with validation, backend submission, loading states, and success/error UI handling.
frontend/src/components/forms/FormFeedba: Alert component displaying success or error messages with optional dismiss functionality.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer showing church info, service times, location, and a branded caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Layout wrapper with header, footer, and routed content via Outlet.
frontend/src/components/media/PageHeader: Displays a large header image with optional overlayed children content.
frontend/src/components/nav/SiteHeader.t: Responsive site header with desktop and mobile navigation, highlighting active routes.
frontend/src/components/resources/Resour: Renders a list of resources with titles, descriptions, and optional external links.
frontend/src/components/scripture/Script: Shows a scripture quote with text, reference, and translation.
frontend/src/components/sections/Liturgy: Ordered list of liturgy items with optional descriptions.
frontend/src/components/sections/Section: Generic section wrapper with spacing and container styling.
frontend/src/components/sermons/SermonLi: Displays a sermon card with title, metadata, audio link, and navigation to details.
frontend/src/content/confession1689.ts: Exports structured 1689 confession chapters with titles and paragraphs.
frontend/src/content/scripture.ts: Provides scripture text objects for various pages and topics.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login state and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching sermons, service info, and submitting contact forms using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes plus typography and prose styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity context providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with sections describing the church’s identity, history, leadership, and commitments.
frontend/src/pages/BeliefsPage.tsx: Displays core doctrinal beliefs with explanatory text and scripture quotes, covering gospel, grace, covenant theology, and worship.
frontend/src/pages/ConfessionPage.tsx: Shows an introduction to the 1689 Confession and renders all chapters with paragraphs and separators.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Provides contact and visit information including address, service times, and a contact form.
frontend/src/pages/DiscipleshipPage.tsx: Presents discipleship teachings on membership, catechism, and family worship with supporting scripture quotes.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the home page with a hero image, welcome text, scripture quote, service info, and links to beliefs and confession pages.
frontend/src/pages/ResourcesPage.tsx: Displays categorized Reformed Baptist resources including confessions, catechisms, and recommended reading using ResourceList components.
frontend/src/pages/SermonDetailPage.tsx: Fetches and displays a single sermon’s details, metadata, audio link, and full text, with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/SermonsPage.tsx: Lists all sermons with loading and error handling, rendering SermonListItem components in a grid.
frontend/src/pages/WorshipPage.tsx: Describes the church’s worship practices, liturgy order, and visitor expectations, using a header image and LiturgyList.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, fonts, container settings, and animations with typography and other plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project state and requirements for building a reverent, minimalist church website, including design principles, tone guidelines, required images, and existing feature specifications. Contains architectural notes, page structure expectations, and content constraints.
